org.jasig.cas.support.saml.web.idp.profile

Class SSOPostProfileCallbackHandlerController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jasig.cas.support.saml.web.idp.profile.AbstractSamlProfileHandlerController
      • org.jasig.cas.support.saml.web.idp.profile.SSOPostProfileCallbackHandlerController

  • @Controller(value="ssoPostProfileCallbackHandlerController")
public class SSOPostProfileCallbackHandlerController
extends AbstractSamlProfileHandlerController
    This is SSOPostProfileCallbackHandlerController, which handles the profile callback request to build the final saml response.

    5.0.0
